attributes.review: This app took a month to download, and once it downloaded bugs crawled out of my SCREENN!!! Then “would you rather” popped up and asked me “would you rather be a bath or a toilet” then random words started to pop up like “pork, bagel, flabbergasted, and  aardvark.” THIS APP IS CRAZYY!! I DON’T RECOMMEND. This app is poorly designed looks like a 5 year old made it.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review:
This app is horrible it took two weeks to download! And the worst part is when I downloaded. It just won’t let me go back to
My home screen and it makes my phone shut down. And it glitches so
Much! I just have to give it a 1 star I don’t recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I expected a well, organized app. But instead I receive an app the was very horrible. It was disorganized, it had too many ads, and it was lagging 90% of the time. Please don’t consider taking the time out of your day to download this app.
attributes.title: Not worth downloading

attributes.review: This app is the slowest app ever. It crashes so much it’s so hard to use I don’t understand why this is even an issue everyday when I try to use it it just won’t open and I have to redownload  it everyday. Some time it opens and it’s so slow! I don’t think anyone should get this app.
attributes.title: This app! TRUMP 2020!!!!

attributes.review: Worst app I have ever seen in my life. I waiting hours for it to download and when it did it just kept crashing. The few times I could actually get it to open I saw wildly inappropriate content. Absolutely do not recommend. I would go less stars if I could.
attributes.title: Absolute garbage

attributes.review: This app has to be the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. So many things went wrong with my phone. Apps stopped working, things got deleted, and it took SO long to download it. After it finally downloaded, it downloaded a virus, which caused me to have to get a new phone. I STRONGLY don’t recommend getting!
